SELECT
, CASE WHEN AU.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN AU.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE AU.USER_NAME END AS USER_NAME FROM ACTIVITY_BASIC activityBasic JOIN APP_USER AU ON activityBasic.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM WHERE activityBasic.JOIN_CODE = #{joinCode}

WITH ACTIVITY AS ( SELECT ACT_NUM, USER_NUM AS HOST_USER_NUM, CASE WHEN USER_NUM = #{userNum} THEN true ELSE false END AS IS_HOST FROM ACTIVITY_BASIC WHERE JOIN_CODE = #{joinCode} LIMIT 1 ), HOST_INFO(NAME) AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN U.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN U.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE U.USER_NAME END FROM ACTIVITY A JOIN APP_USER U ON A.HOST_USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM ), TOTAL_PARTICIPANT(COUNT) AS ( SELECT COUNT(USER_SET.USER_NUM) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT USER_NUM FROM ACTIVITY A JOIN ACTIVITY_SET ACS ON A.ACT_NUM = ACS.ACT_NUM ) USER_SET ), SUB_ACTIVITY AS ( SELECT AD.ACT_NUM, AD.ACD_TITLE, AD.START_DATE, AD.END_DATE, CASE WHEN AD.COST IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AD.COST END AS COST, AD.PAY_TYPE, AD.PRE_PAID_USER, AU.USER_LINE_NAME FROM ACTIVITY A JOIN ACTIVITY_DT AD ON A.ACT_NUM = AD.ACT_NUM JOIN APP_USER AU ON AD.PRE_PAID_USER = AU.USER_NUM ), TOTAL_PAYMENT(TOTAL_COST) AS ( SELECT SUM(COST) FROM SUB_ACTIVITY ) SELECT AB.ACT_NUM, AB.ACT_TITLE, NAME AS HOST_USER_NAME, AB.START_DATE, COUNT AS USER_COUNT, CASE WHEN TOTAL_COST IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_COST END AS CURRENT_COST, CASE WHEN AU.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN AU.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE AU.USER_NAME END AS USER_NAME, SA.ACD_TITLE AS D_ACD_TITLE, d19(SA.START_DATE) AS D_START_DATE, d19(SA.END_DATE) AS D_END_DATE, SA.COST AS D_COST, SA.PAY_TYPE AS D_PAY_TYPE, SA.PRE_PAID_USER AS D_PRE_PAID_USER, SA.USER_LINE_NAME AS D_PAYER_NAME, A.IS_HOST FROM ACTIVITY A JOIN ACTIVITY_BASIC AB ON A.ACT_NUM = AB.ACT_NUM JOIN ACTIVITY_SET ACS ON AB.ACT_NUM = ACS.ACT_NUM JOIN APP_USER AU ON ACS.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN SUB_ACTIVITY SA ON AB.ACT_NUM = SA.ACT_NUM, HOST_INFO, TOTAL_PARTICIPANT, TOTAL_PAYMENT WHERE ACS.USER_NUM = #{userNum}

SELECT
FROM ACTIVITY_SET ACS JOIN ACTIVITY_BASIC AB ON ACS.ACT_NUM = AB.ACT_NUM WHERE ACS.USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND ACS.STATUS = '1' /* 參加中 */

SELECT AB.ACT_NUM, AB.USER_NUM, AB.JOIN_CODE, AB.ACT_TITLE, CASE WHEN AU.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN AU.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE AU.USER_NAME END AS USER_NAME FROM ACTIVITY_BASIC AB JOIN APP_USER AU ON AB.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM WHERE AB.USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND AB.END_DATE IS NULL AND AB.ACT_STATUS <> '9'

SELECT AB.ACT_NUM, AB.ACT_TITLE, AB.USER_NUM AS HOST_USER_NUM, ACS.ACS_NUM AS S_ACS_NUM, AU.USER_NUM AS S_USER_NUM, AU.USER_LINE_ID AS S_USER_LINE_ID FROM ACTIVITY_BASIC AB JOIN ACTIVITY_SET ACS ON AB.ACT_NUM = ACS.ACT_NUM JOIN APP_USER AU ON ACS.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM WHERE AB.JOIN_CODE = #{joinCode} AND ACS.STATUS <> '9'
